snippet: Carmen Gonzalez came to New York from Puerto Rico and made a life for herself, but her professional, financial and personal successes crumbled when her spine condition worsened and she underwent two operations.
abstract: Carmen Gonzalez of Brooklyn is provided with funds to buy laptop and printer to aid in her goal of starting business by Catholic Charities Brooklyn and Queens, one of agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund.
lead_paragraph: Carmen Gonzalez came to New York from Puerto Rico and made a life for herself, but her professional, financial and personal successes crumbled when her spine condition worsened and she underwent two operations.

headline.print_headline: A Dream of Owning a Business Again After Being Derailed by Severe Scoliosis
headline.main: Fighting Scoliosis, and Dreaming of Having Her Own Business Again

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
